We must ask ourselves: what can we automate? – Geoffrey Hinton
The future depends on some graduate student who is deeply suspicious of what I have just said. – Geoffrey Hinton
Neural networks are just glorified curve fitters. – Anonymous skeptic
The only way to get smarter is by playing a smarter opponent. – Fundamentals of Deep RL
Data is the new oil, but it's only valuable if refined. – Clive Humby
Machine learning is the high-interest credit card of technical debt. – D. Sculley, Google
Every model is wrong, but some are useful. – George Box
The greatest enemy of knowledge is not ignorance, it is the illusion of knowledge. – Stephen Hawking
The question of whether a computer can think is no more interesting than the question of whether a submarine can swim. – Edsger Dijkstra
Success in machine learning comes from intuition, not just math. – Andrej Karpathy
Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change. – Stephen Hawking
A year spent in AI is enough to make one believe in God. – Alan Perlis
Sometimes it pays to be a little bit dumb. – Yann LeCun (on CNNs)
You don’t understand something until you can program it. – Anonymous
Deep Learning is not magic. It’s gradient descent and big matrices. – Twitter ML
If debugging is the process of removing bugs, then programming must be the process of putting them in. – Edsger Dijkstra
It’s not who has the best algorithm, it’s who has the most data. – Unknown
The best minds of my generation are thinking about how to make people click ads. – Jeff Hammerbacher
Research is what I’m doing when I don’t know what I’m doing. – Wernher von Braun
The more data you have, the better your guesses. – Nate Silver
If you torture the data long enough, it will confess to anything. – Ronald Coase
There’s no data like more data. – Unknown
A model is only as good as the data it sees. – Every ML paper ever
The bitter lesson: General methods that leverage computation win. – Rich Sutton
GPT-4 is a blurry JPEG of the web. – Yannic Kilcher
Bias in, bias out. – Everyone in AI ethics
Premature optimization is the root of all evil. – Donald Knuth
In God we trust. All others must bring data. – W. Edwards Deming
An AI system is only as unbiased as its training data. – Common sense
The simplest solution is often the best. – Occam's Razor
Correlations are not explanations and besides, they can be as spurious as the high correlation in Finland between foxes and divorces. – David Freedman
AI is whatever hasn't been done yet. – Larry Tesler
Making something learn is easier than making it explain. – AI interpretability folk
Never trust a model you don’t understand. – ML interpretability motto
Train your models like you train your dog. – Fast.ai
More layers, more power. – Deep Learning mantra
One man’s signal is another man’s noise. – Nate Silver
With great power comes great overfitting. – ML Spider-Man
True intelligence is the ability to fake it convincingly. – Anonymous
Don't anthropomorphize AI. It hates that. – Joke
Data beats math. Usually. – ML Engineer, probably
Just because your model is accurate doesn’t mean it’s right. – AI Ethics 101
Models rot without data maintenance. – ML Ops saying
Every dataset is a haunted house. – Abeba Birhane
The best ML models are always in notebooks. – Real devs know
The first 90% of the code accounts for the first 90% of the development time. The remaining 10% takes the other 90% of the time. – Tom Cargill
Don't just fit the data. Understand it. – Wise ML Prof
Behind every great model is a great preprocessing pipeline. – Data Scientists everywhere
The best hyperparameter is more data. – Classic
